title: PLease Help me to Make a Logo
content:
Hi! to all people here. Please help me to design a new logo for our company. The name of our company is SUNERTECH. I hope you will help me guys. Thanks a lot.

 [‹ LogoDesign / What do you think?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44777 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design for yourself... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44702 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nick_jp3

comments.content: Sure, where do we send out quotation to?
